entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Churchill Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:48 AM AST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -6.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Churchill Falls 12:14 PM AST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -6.1°C
Pressure: 99.6 kPa
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -8.1°C
Wind: E 46 km/h gust 68 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 80. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 18 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this evening then partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Saturday 24 December 2022
